mapper.sql: CUSTOM_ID, CUSTOM_NAME, CUSTOM_PROPERTIES, WEBSITE, TICKET_CODE, SUPERIOR_UNITS, OWNER, STAFF, TRADE_NUMBER, CUSTOM_TYPE, CUSTOM_STATE, CUSTOM_SOURCE, HEAD_ID, FIXED_PHONE, CELL_PHONE, CUSTOM_FAX, DEPOSIT_BANK, BANK_ACCOUT, NEXTCONTACT_TIME, EMAIL, SIC_CODE, PAY_WAY, EFFECTIVITY, DETAIL_ADDRESS, REMARK, COM_ID, LAST_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SAL_CUSTOM_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SAL_CUSTOM_INFO (CUSTOM_ID, CUSTOM_NAME, CUSTOM_PROPERTIES, WEBSITE, TICKET_CODE, SUPERIOR_UNITS, OWNER, STAFF, TRADE_NUMBER, CUSTOM_TYPE, CUSTOM_STATE, CUSTOM_SOURCE, HEAD_ID, FIXED_PHONE, CELL_PHONE, CUSTOM_FAX, DEPOSIT_BANK, BANK_ACCOUT, NEXTCONTACT_TIME, EMAIL, SIC_CODE, PAY_WAY, EFFECTIVITY, DETAIL_ADDRESS, REMARK, COM_ID, LAST_TIME ) values (#{customId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superiorUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depositBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccout,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nextcontactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update SAL_CUSTOM_INFO
CUSTOM_ID = #{record.customId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUSTOM_NAME = #{record.customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_PROPERTIES = #{record.customProperties,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE = #{record.website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TICKET_CODE = #{record.ticketCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPERIOR_UNITS = #{record.superiorUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER = #{record.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TRADE_NUMBER = #{record.tradeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_TYPE = #{record.customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_STATE = #{record.customState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_SOURCE = #{record.customSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEAD_ID = #{record.headId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

DEPOSIT_BANK = #{record.depositBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUT = #{record.bankAccout,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NEXTCONTACT_TIME = #{record.nextcontactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIC_CODE = #{record.sicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_WAY = #{record.payWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECTIVITY = #{record.effectivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DETAIL_ADDRESS = #{record.detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_ID = #{record.comId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_TIME = #{record.lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where CUSTOM_ID = #{customId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
